nodes.text: Coral Collegium was a school on Dac, a world where education was highly valued. The technician Tendaar Bel was enrolled in astrophysics classes there, although he never actually attended the curriculum. He was there until the Subjugation of Mon Calamari in 19 BBY when he was put to work in the Mon Calamari Shipyards.
The Collegium is mentioned in Tendaar Bel's Character Folio included with Fantasy Flight Games' 2014 roleplaying game Star Wars: Age of Rebellion Beginner Game.
